sense.def:
To give someone an assurance about something
pomeni nekomu reči, da je tisto vsekakor res ali se bo zgodilo, da bi mu olajšali skrbi.

seg.quote: One must be content with assurances that progress is being made.

sense.def:
To do something with assurance
pomeni, da tisto storimo z zaupanjem in gotovostjo vase.

seg.quote: "She'll like that," said Lally with assurance.

sense.def:
Assurance
je tudi jamstvo, ki nam omogoči odškodnino v primeru nekaterih dogodkov, na primer smrti.
